oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A description of further aspects of the purification or cleansing ritual (|koa). The father (of the man who has killed another) blows smoke onto his son's back and chest and then gives him some to smoke. He warns his son not to smoke Indian Hemp until he has been cleansed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Further particulars regarding the purification or cleansing (|koa)
